title: Dear Fellow GDers
body:
As most of you probably know, I'm not one for ranked. I've only ever played 16 ranked games: the 6 I played in season 3 (absolutely terrible experience) and the 10 placements I went through in season 4 (during the last 36 hours of the season, placed Silver 3. It was a wonderful experience, everyone was so nice).

My point is, I'm thinking about jumping into ranked before the season ends and seeing if I can get gold (Maokai's a bit of a favourite of mine, it would suck to miss out on his Victorious skin). I wanted to know what everyone thinks of this and maybe even get some advice.

Sincerely,
*(Probably)* The most autistic person here.
